name: Baldi is a notebook
description:
Install instructions

Your friend left all his noteboos again and while you were getting them, you noticed something...odd. Baldi is now a notebook! wow! How can this bee?!! He made a deal with the notebook gods to turn him into a notebook ONE AND FOR ALL?? you need to collect all 7 (real) noteboos and GET OUT WHILE YOU STILL CAN!! otherwise Baldi will turn YOU into a notebook.

Extract the zip file and then find the file called "BALDI.exe". (it should be the first thing you see when you open the zip file). Run the executable and have fun!
